q: Allen Iverson returned to the game. Rasheed Wallace 's 3-pointer with 10.4 seconds left ended a nearly 7-minute scoring drought. Richard Hamilton 's two free throws with 3.8 seconds to go avoided a monumental collapse from a 29-point third-quarter lead. Honestly, I didn't want to go back in, said Allen Iverson , who scored 20 points through three quarters.`` I felt that our second team should have closed that thing out.'' CEO apologizes for` shyster' comments David Shepardson/ The Detroit News San Francisco- Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne apologized today for describing the$ 12 billion U.S. government bailout that saved the company as shyster loans.`` Sergio Marchionne has repeatedly lamented the fact that the company paid more than$ 1.2 billion last year in interest on its loans. Killer bees, space aliens... now it's the invasion of the bankrupt states. The truth is, no state wants to declare bankruptcy, no state needs to declare bankruptcy, and no state would.
